transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Haan ji mam, Mohit baat kar raha hu mam. Abhi baat hui thi na aapse?
Executive: Ji sir.
Customer: Hello? Haan, to abhi na aapne, maine guide kiya tha aapko kuch lead aapne consume kiye hai.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: Thik hai? Haan, abhi mai aapse kya keh raha tha ki aapko kya, mainly kya kya dikkat aa rahi thi vo thoda sa bataiye mereko.
Customer: Yahi ki lead nahi mil pa rahi thi.
Customer: Aur jo hamara jinse matlab baat hui thi jinpe paas payment gaya tha vo na hi to call receive kar rahe hai na hi kuch ye.
Executive: Haan, dekho mam aapko mai batata hu.
Customer: Bataye.
Executive: Ji. Unka naam kya tha mam?
Customer: Shashank tha.
Executive: Achha, thik hai. Unhone na aapko IndiaMART ka naam hai Simran mam.
Customer: Simran.
Executive: Thik hai? Ji. Koi nahi mai aapko batata hu. Dekho mam unka kaam tha aapko package samjhaya IndiaMART ka. Thik hai, package samjhane ke baad aapko saari cheeze guide ki. Aapne IndiaMART pe payment kiya aur aapne service li. Thik hai? Uske baad kya hota hai unke end se profile IndiaMART ke head office me aa jata hai aapka. Thik hai? Ab Tawariya Soap and Hair Oils ye jo aapka profile hai na, ye IndiaMART ke head office me aa gaya. Thik hai? Yani ki mere paas. Abhi kya hai ki aapka account manager mai hu.
Executive: Thik hai? Ye cheez maine aapko same jo aapka primary number hai na Vinita mam ka, unko maine bataya tha. Starting me jab aapka aapne service li thi, to unse meri baat bhi hui thi. Thik hai? To unhone kabhi mera phone nahi uthaya tha. Maine fir bhi kai baar connect kiya unko. Unhone mera kabhi phone nahi uthaya. To just jab aapne apna concern raise kiya, jab aapne apni complaint raise ki thi subah me. Ji. Thik hai? Tab mere paas maine aapko fir se connect kiya mam. Thik hai? To abhi kya hai ki abhi se aap mere ko hi connect karegi.
Executive: Thik hai? Aapki service me koi dikkat rehti hai. Thik hai? Aapko lead nahi milti hai, aapko calls related enquiry se related ya buyleads se related. Thik hai? To aap mere ko connect kijiyega, thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Haan, abhi aapko buylead me ek 5000 piece ki requirement hai mam. Ye Karnataka se customer hai. Ye doctor Lavender shop ki.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Dikhaiye mam aapko?
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Haan, to ye wali lead pe aap contact buy now pe click kijiye.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Kiya mam?
Customer: Kar liya.
Executive: Achha, ye wali lead aapne consume kar li?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ek minute.
Executive: Haan mam, aapne ye lead consume ki hai. Thik hai? To haan abhi na isko customer ko call lagana. Thik hai? To apna aapko fir kaise deal karte hai, kaise nahi karte hai us hisab se aap baat kare customer se, thik hai? To usi tarah se aapko na lead is tarah se consume karni hai aur aapko filter lagana aata hai mam ki filter kaise lagate hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Thik hai? To aap ye bataiye aap all over India deal karte hai ya fir local me deal karte hai?
Customer: Nahi all all round India me hi hu.
Executive: All over India me karte hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Achha achha.
Executive: Thik hai. To aapko na all India ka filter lagana hai.
Executive: Thik hai? Ji.
Executive: Ek minute mam line pe rahiye.
Executive: Haan mam.
Customer: Ji. Hello?
Executive: Haan, mam mai ye keh raha hu ki haan to aapko na filter India ka filter laga ke aur aapko vaha pe product ka filter bhi hota hoga. Aapne dekha hoga ki product ka filter laga ke aapko apni lead consume kijiye aur customer se discuss kijiye aur apna deal finalize kijiye.
Executive: Thik hai? Thik hai sir.
Executive: Abhi aapne ek aur concern bataya tha ki aapka aap apna mail, apna mobile number ye saari cheeze change karana chahti hai. Yaha pe abhi aapki ek is tarah se number laga hua hai. Thik hai? Aur is tarah ka ek mail yaha pe laga hua hai. To aapko apna mobile number lagana hai. Thik hai? To abhi jab aap system pe aayegi na, thik hai? Ah, abhi kya abhi aapne jo video meeting connect kiya tha vo phone se kiya tha. Aap system pe ek baar aayega. Mai aapka mail, mobile number ye saari cheeze change kara dunga, thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Haan, aap jaise system pe aayenge aap mere ko connect kar lijiyega. Mai aapka turant change kara dunga. Thik hai? To abhi filhaal me aisa koi dikkat to nahi hai na mam?
Customer: No sir.
Executive: Haan, agar aage aisa koi dikkat lage to aap mere ko connect kar lijiyega. To mai aapne jo morning me subah concern open kiya tha na mam, thik hai? Vo mai close kar de raha hu, thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Haan, to mam aapka jo yaha pe mail registered hai na ek mail aur WhatsApp pe feedback gaya hoga mera. Ah, ek to yaha pe mail is wale mail pe gaya hoga kamdarvinita20@gmail.com. Is wale mail pe mera feedback jayega. Thik hai? Aur WhatsApp pe jayega. To please usme satisfied me yes mark kara dijiyega, thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Haan haan. Thik hai mam, mai aapka profile close kar de raha hu. Profile nahi sorry, aapka ek concern jo complaint raise kiya tha vo mai close kar de raha hu. Thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Haan haan, okay thank you mam.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting leads.

- Payment made, but no response from contact person.

- Wants to change registered email and mobile number.



Resolution:

- Executive provided a buylead of 5000 pieces.

- Explained how to consume leads and use filters.

- Promised to change email and mobile number on system access.

- Closed the morning concern/complaint.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to connect with executive after system access.

- Customer to mark 'yes' for satisfaction in feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, filters, profile update, feedback
